_comment_MAX_EXECUTION_RETRIES: Number of retries for code execution failures (timeouts/errors)
_comment_MAX_ANSWER_RETRIES: Number of retries when code produces wrong answer
_comment_LLM_REQUEST_RETRY_COUNT: Number of retries for failed LLM API requests
_comment_LLM_REQUEST_TIMEOUT_SECONDS: Timeout for LLM API requests in seconds
_comment_EXECUTION_TIMEOUT_SECONDS: Timeout for code execution in seconds
_comment_MAX_CONCURRENT_REQUESTS: Maximum number of concurrent LLM requests
